name: VCTR-SCTR
storyline: A beautiful reimagined game that takes aspects of different vector and space games into a artfully crafted vector remixed game. A proper and fun homage to vector games of decades past, in a new fun, epic, relaxing, and exhilarating way. Get ready for a history lesson in a new remade and remixed way, this is VCTR-SCTR!
summary:
VCTR-SCTR is a new game developed by Digital Eclipse that combines elements of several vector based games to celebrate vector games. Featuring different gameplay aspects of iconic vector and space games like: Asteroids, Lunar Lander, Solaris, Major Havoc, and Tempest.
It has been released as part of "Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration"
